abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews concert of Bach works performed by violinist Jennifer Koh at the American Academy of Arts and Letters.
snippet: The violinist Jennifer Koh played Bach’s Unaccompanied Sonatas and Partitas in a single marathon concert presented by the Miller Theater.
